extensionp2: has helped us to release an awesome Google Chrome Extension for JustGetMyData.
extensionp3: When you are on a website that is listed on JustGetMyData, the Chrome Extension will add a small dot to the omnibar. Clicking on this dot will take you to the relevant obtain page.

tagline: A directory of direct links for you to obtain your data from web services.
title: Just Get My Data | A directory of direct links to you obtain your data from web services.
whatisthis3: techniques to make it difficult to find how to obtain your data. JustGetMyData aims to be a directory of urls to enable you to easily obtain your data from web services.
